title: Best of The Herd: 09/27/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/27/2018
description:
Colin talks about Baker Mayfield being a star and that doesn't always have to do with talent. He thinks Kevin Durant is trying to play the victim and can't stand it. Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films talks about how good the Rams are, how much Dak Prescott has struggled and explains why the Raiders are improving more than people think. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
